Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a string telephone being used by two students to communicate over a distance.
The student can draw how the device uses sound to send or receive information.
The student can represent the scientific idea of sound traveling along the string to facilitate communication.
The student can show how tools and materials (like cups and string) are used to design the string telephone.
The student can demonstrate the importance of such technology for communication across long distances.
